meanings.definition: Having a tendency to munch or chew noisily
meanings.sent1: The munchy squirrel nibbled on the crunchy nuts.
meanings.sent2: The kids loved the munchy popcorn during the movie.
meanings.sent3: The munchy rabbit made a loud crunching sound while eating.
meanings.sent4: The munchy puppy devoured its food like a little vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent5: The munchy sound of the chips being eaten echoed in the room.

meanings.definition: A snack or food that is enjoyable to munch on
meanings.sent1: I always keep a bag of munchy chips for movie nights.
meanings.sent2: The crunchy granola bars are my favorite munchy treat.
meanings.sent3: The munchy cookies disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: The munchy trail mix was a lifesaver during the hike.
meanings.sent5: The munchy sound of the popcorn being eaten filled the room.
